title: Flipped Learning-Based Chinese Language Pre-Service Teacher Competency Development Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Chinese character recognition, no foreign language learning experience
context.additional_context: An environment where in-service teachers can demonstrate lessons directly to learners and provide feedback.

learning_goals: Learners can use 100 basic Chinese characters (HSK Level 1) to construct daily conversational scenarios (15 situations)
Learners can participate in class discussions after completing at least 80% of the video lectures (including subtitles).
Learners can perform actual classroom scenarios at least three times through role-playing with peer teachers.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
